formLanguageCode.description: Code to indicate whether the test was conducted in English or Welsh

applicationReference.description: The full application identifier, including applicationId, bookingSequence and checkDigit

applicationId.description: Unique identifier for each test application

bookingSequence.description: Booking sequence number of the test application

checkDigit.description: Reference checksum for the test application

insuranceDeclarationAccepted.description: Whether or not the candidate has declared that their test vehicle has a valid insurance policy

residencyDeclarationAccepted.description: Whether or not the candidate has declared that they have lived in the UK for a period acceptable for taking the test

signature.description: Base 64 encoded binary data representing a PNG image of the candidates signature

preTest.description: Data related to the test phase prior to the test report

completedTest.description: Data required to feed into TARS for completed tests

formReference.description: ??? - seems to be in the format YYMMDD-NNNA-NNN

licenceSurrender.description: Flag to indicate whether the candidate's provisional licence was surrendered after a successful test

testDate.description: Date that the test took place

automaticTestInd.description: Flag to indicate an automatic or manual test, true = automatic

passCertificateNumber.description: Certificate number assigned at the end of a successful test

extendedTestInd.description: Flag to indicate an extended test, true = extended

testResult.description: Outcome of a completed test - P = Pass, F = Fail

nonCompletedTest.description: Data required to feed into TARS for non-completed tests

imageReference.description: ??? - used to link the NCT record back to a DL25 scanned image - not required???

nonCompletionCode.description: Numeric code relating to the Non Completion Reason

category.description: Category code for the test report

slotId.description: Unique identifier for the journal test slot

activityCode.description: Code representing the result of the test
